            dist = dist + diff*diff 

         end do

         real(kind=8) :: fractional = sqrt_dist - floor(sqrt_dist) if (fractional < 0.001 .or.

   if (mod(K,2) ==0 .or. mod(K,5) ==0) then 

      print*, -1 

   else 

      if (mod(K,7) ==0) then

      ! Now compute ans

      else

            ans = ans +1 

            remainder = mod(remainder *10, K) 

         end do

      end if 

   end if 

end program main

Let me restructure the code properly. Here's the corrected Fortran code:

program main 

   implicit none 

   integer :: N, D, count, K, ans, remainder 

   integer, allocatable :: vectors(:,:) 

   integer :: i,j,d, dist 

   real(kind=8) :: sqrt_dist, fractional

children.text:
Read N and D 

   read*, N, D 

   allocate(vectors(N,D)) 

   ! Read vectors 

   do i=1,N 

      read*, vectors(i,1:D) end do 

   ! Compute count 

   count =0 

   do i=1,N-1 

      do j=i+1,N 

         dist =0 

         do d=1,D 

            dist = dist + (vectors(i,d) - vectors(j,d))**2 

         end do 

         sqrt_dist = sqrt(real(dist, kind=8)) fractional = sqrt_dist - floor(sqrt_dist) if (fractional < 0.001) then 

            count = count +1 

         end if 

      end do 

   end do 

   ! Process second part 

   K = count 

   if (mod(K,2) ==0 .or. mod(K,5) ==0) then 

      print*, -1 

   else 

      if (mod(K,7) ==0) then 

         K = K /7 

      end if 

      K = K *9 

      ! Compute ans 

      ans =1 

      remainder = mod(10, K) if (remainder ==1) then 

         print*, ans 

      else 

         do while (remainder /=1) 

            ans = ans +1 

            remainder = mod(remainder *10, K) 

         end do 

         print*, ans 

      end if 

   end if 

end program main 

Now, all variables are declared at the top.

program main 

   implicit none 

   integer :: N, D, count, K, ans, remainder 

   integer, allocatable :: vectors(:,:) 

   ! Read N and D 

   read*, N, D 

   allocate(vectors(N,D)) 

   ! Read vectors 

   integer :: i,j,d 

   do i=1,N 

      read*, vectors(i,1:D) 

   end do 

   ! Compute count 

   count =0 

   do i=1,N-1 

      do j=i+1,N 

         integer :: dist 

         dist =0 

         do d=1,D 

            integer :: diff = vectors(i,d) - vectors(j,d) 

            dist = dist + diff*diff 

         end do 

         real(kind=8) :: sqrt_dist 

         sqrt_dist = sqrt(real(dist, kind=8)) 

         real(kind=8) :: fractional = sqrt_dist - floor(sqrt_dist) 

         if (fractional < 0.001 .or. (1.0 - fractional) <0.001) then 

            ! Because sometimes due to floating point, it might be 2.0000000001 or 1.9999999999 

            count = count +1 

         end if 

      end do 

   end do 

   ! Now process second part 

   K = count 

   if (mod(K,2) ==0 .or. mod(K,5) ==0) then 

      print*, -1 

   else 

      if (mod(K,7) ==0) then 

         K = K /7 

      end if 

      K = K *9 

      ! Now compute ans 

      ans =1 

      remainder = mod(10, K) 

      if (remainder ==1) then 

         print*, ans 

      else 

         do while (remainder /=1) 

            ans = ans +1 

            remainder = mod(remainder *10, K) 

         end do 

         print*, ans 

      end if 

   end if 

end program main

Let me restructure the code properly. 

Here's the corrected Fortran code:

program main 

   implicit none 

   integer :: N, D, count, K, ans, remainder 

   integer, allocatable :: vectors(:,:) 

   integer :: i,j,d, dist 

   real(kind=8) :: sqrt_dist, fractional 

   ! Read N and D 

   read*, N, D 

   allocate(vectors(N,D)) 

   ! Read vectors 

   do i=1,N 

      read*, vectors(i,1:D) 

   end do 

   ! Compute count 

   count =0 

   do i=1,N-1 

      do j=i+1,N 

         dist =0 

         do d=1,D 

            dist = dist + (vectors(i,d) - vectors(j,d))**2 

         end do 

         sqrt_dist = sqrt(real(dist, kind=8)) 

         fractional = sqrt_dist - floor(sqrt_dist) 

         if (fractional < 0.001) then 

            count = count +1 

         end if 

      end do 

   end do 

   ! Process second part 

   K = count 

   if (mod(K,2) ==0 .or. mod(K,5) ==0) then 

      print*, -1 

   else 

      if (mod(K,7) ==0) then 

         K = K /7 

      end if 

      K = K *9 

      ! Compute ans 

      ans =1 

      remainder = mod(10, K) 

      if (remainder ==1) then 

         print*, ans 

      else 

         do while (remainder /=1) 

            ans = ans +1 

            remainder = mod(remainder *10, K) 

         end do 

         print*, ans 

      end if 

   end if 

end program main 

Now, all variables are declared at the top. 

The variables dist, sqrt_dist, fractional are declared at the top.

Now, in the first part's loop, for each pair i,j, we compute dist, then compute sqrt_dist and fractional.
